title: Classic Italian Tiramisu
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until pale and thick.
Whip the heavy cream to soft peaks and fold into mascarpone.
Combine mascarpone mixture with egg mixture gently.
Dip ladyfingers briefly into espresso and layer in a dish.
Spread mascarpone cream over the biscuits.
Repeat layers and finish with cream.
Dust generously with cocoa powder.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.
notes: Traditional recipe uses raw eggs; use pasteurized eggs if preferred.

title: Matcha Tiramisu
instructions: Whisk egg yolks with sugar until thick.
Blend mascarpone with half of the matcha powder.
Fold whipped cream into mascarpone mixture.
Dissolve remaining matcha in warm water.
Dip ladyfingers in matcha liquid and layer.
Alternate layers and finish with matcha dusting.
notes: Use culinary-grade matcha for best results.

title: Strawberry Tiramisu
instructions: Whip cream with sugar until soft peaks.
Fold mascarpone into whipped cream.
Slice strawberries and reserve some for garnish.
Dip ladyfingers in strawberry juice.
Layer biscuits, cream, and strawberries.
Chill before serving.
notes: Best served within 24 hours for freshness.

title: Chocolate Tiramisu
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until creamy.
Fold mascarpone and melted chocolate into the mixture.
Whip cream and gently combine with mascarpone mixture.
Dip ladyfingers into espresso and layer in a dish.
Spread chocolate mascarpone cream evenly.
Repeat layers and chill before serving.
notes: Use high-quality dark chocolate for richer flavor.

title: Lemon Tiramisu
instructions: Whip cream and sugar until soft.
Fold mascarpone, lemon zest, and juice into cream.
Dip ladyfingers lightly in lemon juice.
Layer biscuits and lemon cream.
Chill until set.
notes: Light and refreshing variation without coffee.

title: Vegan Tiramisu
instructions: Whip coconut cream until fluffy.
Fold vegan mascarpone with maple syrup.
Combine with whipped coconut cream.
Dip biscuits in espresso.
Layer biscuits and cream.
Dust with cocoa and chill.

title: Pistachio Tiramisu
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until smooth.
Mix mascarpone with pistachio paste.
Fold mascarpone mixture into egg mixture.
Whip cream and gently combine.
Dip ladyfingers in milk and layer.
Spread pistachio cream between layers.
Chill thoroughly before serving.
notes: Top with chopped pistachios for texture.

title: Baileys Tiramisu
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until pale.
Fold mascarpone and Baileys into mixture.
Dip ladyfingers in espresso.
Layer biscuits and Baileys cream.
Chill thoroughly before serving.
notes: Alcohol can be reduced or omitted if desired.

title: Coffee Hazelnut Tiramisu
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until creamy.
Mix mascarpone with hazelnut spread.
Combine egg mixture with mascarpone.
Dip ladyfingers in espresso.
Layer biscuits and hazelnut cream.
Refrigerate before serving.
notes: Pairs well with toasted hazelnut garnish.
